name: npm-fastify
description: This project was bootstrapped with Fastify-CLI.

scripts.start-prod-pm2: NODE_ENV=production pm2 start app.js --name daily --log-date-format 'MM-DD HH:mm:ss ZZ'
scripts.restart-prod-pm2: NODE_ENV=production pm2 restart daily --log-date-format 'MMM-DD HH:mm:ss ZZ'
scripts.start-dev-pm2: NODE_ENV=development pm2 start app.js --name daily-dev --log-date-format 'MM-DD HH:mm:ss ZZ'
scripts.restart-dev-pm2: NODE_ENV=development pm2 restart daily-dev --log-date-format 'MMM-DD HH:mm:ss ZZ'

author: Api3
